DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic/Pharmacodynamic ( PK/PD ) Study Evaluating DA-3031 ( PEG-G-CSF ) Filgrastim ( Dong-A ) Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject , 2040 year inclusive weight 6075 kg inclusive Ideal Body Weight ( IBW ) 15 % +15 % inclusive Written inform consent give Willing able comply requirement protocol Hypersensitivity drug ( aspirin , antibiotic ) History presence clinically significant liver kidney disease , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , respiratory , endocrinal , musculoskeletal , neurologic/psychiatric , hematological , oncological pathology Have history drug abuse , show positive drug abuse urine screen Have participate another clinical study within 2 month prior enter inth study Have persistently drink alcohol stop drinking alcohol study Smokers whose average smoke last 3 month 10 cigarettes/day Are consider ineligible investigator due clinical laboratory result relevant reason
